docs.snippet: In a radio appearance on Wednesday, Coach Mike Woodson said J. R. Smith, whom he benched in Tuesday’s game, needed to “grow up” and “be more of a pro.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a radio appearance on Wednesday, Coach Mike Woodson said J. R. Smith, whom he benched in Tuesday’s game, needed to “grow up” and “be more of a pro.”
docs.abstract: New York Knicks coach Mike Woodson, in radio interview, clarifies motivation behind benching star J R Smith, repeatedly saying that Smith needs to 'grow up'.

headline.main: Woodson Offers Clues to Most Recent Benching of Smith
